source.query:
SELECT to_char(generate_series(max(c.date)::date + INTERVAL '1 day', now() - INTERVAL '1 day', '1 day')::date,'YYYYMMDD') AS DATE
,A.pum_cd
, A.pum_nm
, A.unit_qty
, A.unit_cd
, B.MARKET
FROM cd_ods.tb_at_auctionitem_qty_distribution_master A,
(SELECT  UNNEST(ARRAY['1','3']) AS MARKET) B,
cd_ods.tb_at_auctionitem_qty_distribution c
GROUP BY A.pum_cd
, A.pum_nm
, A.unit_qty
, A.unit_cd
, B.MARKET
;

select to_char(now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'garak' as market
FROM cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_intermediary
union
select 
to_char(now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'yanggok' as market
FROM cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_intermediary
order by date;

(select to_char( now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'1' as p_pos_gubun
,'2' as s_pum_nm
union
select 
to_char( now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'3' as p_pos_gubun
,'2' as s_pum_nm
union
select to_char( now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'1' as p_pos_gubun
,'3' as s_pum_nm
union
select 
to_char( now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'3' as p_pos_gubun
,'3' as s_pum_nm
)
order by date;

activities.name: Lookup API Info
activities.description: API 정보를 가져오기 위해 LOOKUP 파일에서CATEGORY, CALLNAME을 읽어옵니다.

source.query:
WITH v_seq AS 
 (
 	select   generate_series( '2021', '2021', 1  ) AS num 
 )
 select  to_char(to_date('0','yyyy') + interval '1 year' * v_seq.num,'yyyy') as year      
FROM v_seq

SELECT YEAR, adm_cd , '1' AS low_search
FROM cd_ods.tb_sgis_stats_population_t
WHERE length(adm_cd) = 2
UNION ALL
SELECT YEAR, adm_cd , '2' AS low_search
FROM cd_ods.tb_sgis_stats_population_t
WHERE length(adm_cd) = 2

WITH v_seq AS 
 (
 	select   generate_series( '2021', '2021', 1  ) AS num 
 )
 select  to_char(to_date('0','yyyy') + interval '1 year' * v_seq.num,'yyyy') as year      
FROM v_seq

SELECT YEAR, adm_cd , '1' AS low_search
FROM cd_ods.tb_sgis_stats_searchpopulation_t
WHERE length(adm_cd) = 2

SELECT YEAR, adm_cd , '1' AS low_search
FROM cd_ods.tb_sgis_stats_searchpopulation_t
WHERE length(adm_cd) = 5

preCopyScript.value:
DELETE FROM cd_ods.tb_nielsen_data
WHERE PER_TAG BETWEEN '@{variables('minWeek')}' AND '@{variables('maxWeek')}'

DELETE FROM cd_ods.tb_nielsen_per
WHERE TAG BETWEEN '@{variables('minWeek')}' AND '@{variables('maxWeek')}'

activities.name: Set yyyymm_copy1

수행일 기준 전월 구하기

query.value:
delete from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_mkt a
where exists ( select 1 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_mkt_temp where tag = a.tag);

insert into  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_mkt
(
     tag 
	,short 
	,long 
	,display_order
	,parent_tag 
	,hier_num 
	,hier_name
	,hier_level_num 
	,hier_level_name 
	,if_date
    ,ifyyyymm 
)
select   tag 
		,short 
		,long 
		,display_order
		,parent_tag 
		,hier_num 
		,hier_name
		,hier_level_num 
		,hier_level_name 
		,if_date
	    ,'@{variables('yyyymm')}' if_yyyymm 
 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_mkt_temp;


delete from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod a
where exists ( select 1 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_temp2 where tag = a.tag);

insert into  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod
(
    tag  
   ,short
    ,long
	,display_order 
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num 
	,hier_name 
	,hier_level_num
	,hier_level_name 
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1 
	,ifyyyymm
)
select  tag  
   ,short
    ,long
	,display_order 
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num 
	,hier_name 
	,hier_level_num
	,hier_level_name 
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1 
	,'@{variables('yyyymm')}' ifyyyymm
 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_temp2 ;

delete from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_history
 where  ifyyyymm = '@{variables('yyyymm')}';

insert into  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_history
(
    tag  
   ,short
    ,long
	,display_order 
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num 
	,hier_name 
	,hier_level_num
	,hier_level_name 
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1 
	,ifyyyymm
)
select  tag  
   ,short
    ,long
	,display_order 
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num 
	,hier_name 
	,hier_level_num
	,hier_level_name 
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1 
	,'@{variables('yyyymm')}' ifyyyymm
 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_temp2 ;

 select 1 su
